Comment: A unique ID number for the record.
The stock code of the serialised stock item.
The serial number assigned to the stock item.
A reference code for the record.
The expiry date on the record.
The location of the serialised stock item.
The actual cost of the item when moved into stock.
The ID number of the Purchase Order that the item has been receipted in against.
The ID number of the Sales Order ID that the item has been committed against.
The ID number of the Creditors Invoice that the item has been receipted in against.
The ID number of the Debtors Invoice ID the item has been sold against.
The ID number of the job that the serial number belongs to (if there is one).
The ID number of the stock transaction that the item was receipted in against.
The ID number of the stock transaction against which the item was moved out of inventory.
The ID number of the related Creditor account.
The ID number of the related Debtor account.
The ID number of the Inwards Goods line that the item is linked to.
The ID number of the job line that the item is linked to.
The ID number of the Sales Order line that the item is linked to.
The ID number of the Purchase Order line that the item is linked to.
The ID number of the Creditors Invoice line that the item is linked to.
The ID number of the Debtors Invoice line that the item is linked to.
This field contains 'Y' if the serial number is in stock.
The ID number of the serviceable unit that the item is linked to.
The date and time when the record was last updated.

N = Not assignedo = assigned to a Sales Orderi = assigned to inwards goodsj = assigned to Job Costingq = assigned to a stock requestp = assigned to a POS parked Sales OrderP = assigned to a POS parked invoice

The invoice ID linked to the Sales Order for the serial number.
The invoice line ID linked to the Purchase Order for the serial number.
The invoice ID linked to the Purchase Order for the serial number.

The line ID of the record that the serial number is linked to. The details of type of record can be determined from the ISASSIGNED field.
